column1: :Beornings are one of the playable cultures. The game describes them as rough Men
column3: gathered under the banner of Beorn. One of their cultural Virtues is the ability to take control of a spirit animal whilst sleeping
column4: a talent taught to some Beornings by Beorn himself.

column1: 2013: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug:
:Beorn tells Thorin and Company that in the past Azog hunted him and his people for sport and that
column3: few of his kind are left. It is one of his prime motivations to help them in Quest of Erebor.
